title: Bloomberg Markets: Sink, Long Discuss Puerto Rico Debt Crisis
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sink, Long Discuss Puerto Rico Debt Crisis
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Cate Long\u0010Founder\u0010Puerto Rico Clearinghouse\u0010Discussing Puerto Rico debt crisis in wake of President Trump's comments that the debt should be wiped clean. Bloomberg News White House Reporter Justin Sink also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
